version_description:
We've made Catch Sports faster than ever, making it even easier to keep up with your favorite teams.
Soccer has been added! Leagues included are EPL, MLS, Bundesliga, La Liga, Ligue 1, Primeira Liga, Serie A.

We've made Catch Sports faster than ever, making it even easier to keep up with your favorite teams.
Soccer has been added! Leagues included are EPL, MLS, Bundesliga, La Liga, Ligue 1, Primeira Liga, Serie A.
This version of Catch Sports introduces SiriusXM Satellite Radio as a way to catch a game.
This version of Catch Sports introduces SiriusXM Satellite Radio as a way to catch a game.

Welcome to Bleacher Report Live, where watching live sports is easy.

We’ve made some major updates including streaming video, enhancements to our search, and new ways to follow your favorite teams and leagues.

Welcome to Bleacher Report Live, where watching live sports is easy.

We’ve made some major updates including streaming video, enhancements to our search, and new ways to follow your favorite teams and leagues.

What’s new in 2.0.1

• We addressed some big bugs with our video player. It should load faster and video playback should be nice and smooth.

• Our bug list was huge! (thank you for helping us find them) Now our list is much smaller, so things should be working much more consistently.

• We added a couple new things and spruced up the UI, so the app should look a little fresher.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

What’s new in 2.0.1

• We addressed some big bugs with our video player. It should load faster and video playback should be nice and smooth.

• Our bug list was huge! (thank you for helping us find them) Now our list is much smaller, so things should be working much more consistently.

• We added a couple new things and spruced up the UI, so the app should look a little fresher.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

What’s new in 2.0.1?
• We fixed several bugs and did some work behind the scenes to improve your experience.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

What’s new in 2.0.1?
• We fixed several bugs and did some work behind the scenes to improve your experience.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

• Buy and watch the live sports you want, when you want. You can now use In-App Purchases to buy single games, and monthly or annual passes, so you'll never miss a game.
• Chromecast! Now you can cast any game to your favorite Chromecast device.
• We fixed several bugs and worked behind the scenes to improve your experience.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

• New Soccer Passes have arrived!
• And, as always, we fixed some bugs to improve your experience.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

• And, as always, we fixed some bugs to improve your experience.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving.

• Phase 1 of hiding spoilers is IN EFFECT! We found out the hard way that you like your replays like you like your milk. Unspoiled. We got a fix out as quickly as possible, and there's more to come for hiding spoilers soon.

• We enhanced and cleaned up some of our In-App Purchase experience, so you can find what you want easier.

• Regular maintenance of bug and crash fixes.

Thanks for being a fan! Keep the feedback coming and we’ll keep improving!

UEFA soccer is here!

• Watch every Champions League and Europa League match LIVE with B/R Live. Whether you like Barcelona or Real Madrid, Manchester United or Manchester City, B/R Live is your home for every UEFA match. Get a yearly or monthly subscription, or go game by game with PPV.

• Spoiler Free Mode is out! You can turn it on and off via the 'More' menu. When it's 'on' we hide any scores, records, rankings, and more. We also adjust your video playback, so it will always start from the beginning and you don't have to worry about getting thrown into the middle of the action.

Thanks for being a fan!

DID SOMEONE SAY IPAD!?
iPad is now supported! Enjoy the full BR Live experience and get the most out of our high def video on your iPad. No more magnified phone screen for you!

NBA season is here (with 4th-quarter purchases!)
We added support for NBA League Pass, so you can enjoy out-of-market NBA broadcasts. We are excited to introduce a new feature: pricing for just the 4th quarter. As soon as the third quarter buzzer sounds, the individual game price drops to $1.99, so you can catch every dramatic finish. Find games here starting October 17.

UEFA rolls on
B/R Live is your home for every UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League. Matchday 2 is October 2-4, followed by Matchday 3 October 23-25. Catch the best soccer competition in the world, including Tottenham vs. Barcelona and Manchester United vs. Juventus. Note that all replays, UEFA highlight and magazine shows, as well as B/R Football Matchday and Post Match shows are available with your soccer subscription.

Thanks for being a fan!

DID SOMEONE SAY IPAD!?

Thanks for being a fan!

Get ready for Tiger vs. Phil. ‘Capital One’s The Match,’ happening Nov. 23.

B/R Live is your home for all UEFA Champions League and UEFA Europa League matches. Match Day 5 is right around the corner - Nov. 27-29 and it includes some big rematches like Tottenham vs. Inter Milan and PSG vs. Liverpool.

Don’t miss the next buzzer beater. Watch all out-of-market NBA games with NBA League Pass, including a new option to purchase just the fourth quarter for $1.99.

We enhanced some things behind the scenes and fixed up some bugs to improve your experience.

Now it's easier than ever to create an account, watch live sports, and follow your favorite teams!

We've made improvements to NBA League Pass, including some new pricing options. We're dropping the price of NBA games after each quarter to make sure you get the most bang for your buck! Make sure to also check out ONE Championship, National Lacrosse League, and FIH Women's Pro League.

We've also done some maintenance and fixed bugs in various areas of the app to help you jump into the action as quickly as possible, and make your experience even better.

Get hyped for UEFA knockout rounds!

Support for upcoming Champions League and Europa League knockout round fixtures, as well as other maintenance and stability improvements.

Fixed an issue where some users could not watch NBA League Pass games.

Introducing the new and improved Watch menu on B/R Live. Our redesigned Watch experience makes it easier for fans to discover and stream live sporting events. With this update, you can spend less time searching for your favorite teams and sports, and more time streaming. We’ve also included some bug fixes to improve your overall experience with B/R Live. Download our latest update now to explore and start streaming.

At Bleacher Report Live, we believe streaming live sports should be easy and we’re always working to better our service. Our latest update contains spoiler-free mode improvements that makes it easier for you to hide and see scores, as well as general bug fixes.
